creator: thowell@olympus.net
text:
Please add the following to question C.5. in
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/misc/FAQ.html:

For release 2.0, after running ./configure and before running make, edit the
build/config_vars.mk file to set 

EXTRA_LIBS=/lib/libcrypt.so.1

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
It's a bug in the build system. We need to check for -lcrypt for htpasswd.linking.
However, you should be able to supply the EXTRA_LIBS variable to configure as
well...

text:
libcrypt.so.N should never be passed directly to the compiler by the build system.

along with:

ls -l /lib/libcrypt.* /usr/lib/libcrypt.*
